verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: met] [ARG1: with Senate Republicans] [ARGM-LOC: at their weekly lunch] but no one brought up their ailing colleague John McCain despite a spat with the White House .

President Donald Trump met with Senate Republicans at their weekly lunch but [ARG0: no one] [V: brought] up [ARG1: their ailing colleague John McCain] [ARGM-ADV: despite a spat with the White House] .
